title: Entangled Intimacy
description: What are you supposed to do when everything inside of you cringes away from the one you love? When one touch is enough to make you scream? One kiss enough to make you run?Jarrod Thorpe promises to wait for her. It's everything she'd normally want to hear but now... it's too much and everything inside her tells her to run for the hills.Finally, she's told her friends about what happened in Brighton but she can't face the idea of telling Jarrod.What if he doesn't love her anymore? What if he gives her the same look everyone else is giving her? What if he pities her?She just can't face it.
author: Hanleigh Bradley
